Title: Relates to reports and awards by the office of victim services
Summary: Requires the office of victim services to publicize programs offered by the office and to include certain information in annual reports to the governor and the legislature and to make such reports public on the office's website; makes alterations to the amounts of and qualifications for awards of compensation to victims of crimes, including good samaritans who are injured.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to reports and awards by the office of victim services
